Disclaimer of Warranties HeroCrick provides the fantasy cricket platform and associated services "as is" and "as available," without any warranties, express or implied. Limitation of Liability Under no circumstances shall HeroCrick, its affiliates, directors, officers, employees, or agents be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or related to your use of our services. This includes, but is not limited to, damages for loss of profits, goodwill, use, data, or other intangible losses. Your use of the HeroCrick platform is at your own risk. We shall not be liable for any loss or damage caused by your reliance on the information or advice provided through our services. No Professional Advice The content and information available on the HeroCrick platform is for informational and entertainment purposes only. It should not be considered as a substitute for professional advice, such as financial, legal, or sports-related expertise. Always consult with qualified professionals before making any decisions that may have a significant impact on your life or finances. User Responsibility As a HeroCrick user, you are solely responsible for the decisions you make regarding your fantasy cricket teams, including the selection of players, the allocation of resources, and the overall management of your team. HeroCrick provides the platform and tools, but does not guarantee the success or performance of your teams. It is your responsibility to stay informed about any changes in the scoring system, player availability, or other factors that may affect the outcomes of your fantasy teams. HeroCrick shall not be held liable for any losses or damages resulting from your decisions or the performance of your teams. Governing Law and Jurisdiction These disclaimers and the use of the HeroCrick platform shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. I highly recommend this app to any fan of the sport who wants to immerse themselves in their favorite game in a new way. Thank you HeroCrick for making my passion for cricket even more exciting!" ✭✭✭✭✭ Nishith Our app offers incredibly realistic gameplay FAQ's about HeroCrick What is HeroCrick? HeroCrick is an exciting fantasy cricket app that allows users to create their own teams of real players and compete against other fans in virtual matches. How does HeroCrick work? In HeroCrick, users must assemble a team of 11 players, while maintaining a certain budget and player limit for each team. These teams then compete against each other in virtual matches, where players are awarded points based on their real-life performance. The team with the most points wins. What are the benefits of HeroCrick? HeroCrick offers a number of unique benefits: 1) Deep immersion into the world of cricket by thoroughly analyzing player statistics and choosing the best team. 2) The ability to compete against other fans around the world and test your analytical skills. 3) Exciting moments during virtual matches when your team scores points. 4) Regular updates, tournaments and other exciting content that maintains interest in the game. What match formats does HeroCrick offer? Answer: HeroCrick offers several different match formats to suit the preferences of different users: - Singles matches: one-on-one competition with another user - Tournaments: multi-round competitions with many participants - Leagues: regular weekly or monthly competitions - Special events: unique matches dedicated to important cricket events How can I start playing HeroCrick? Starting to play HeroCrick is very simple: 1) Download the application to your mobile device. 2) Register and create your account. 3) Study the rules of the game and the features of team formation. 4) Start creating your first team and participate in matches. 5) Track your results, achievements and ratings in gaming communities. Is it possible to earn real money in HeroCrick? Yes, HeroCrick provides the opportunity to earn real cash prizes. The application offers various paid tournaments and competitions, the winners of which receive cash rewards. However, participation in such tournaments is completely voluntary and users can enjoy the gameplay and free-to-play formats. Your road to glory starts here! HeroCrick offers several different match formats to suit the preferences of different users: - Singles matches: one-on-one competition with another user - Tournaments: multi-round competitions with many participants - Leagues: regular weekly or monthly competitions - Special events: unique matches dedicated to important cricket events So if you are ready to challenge the most seasoned cricket experts and become a real hero on the virtual battlefields, then HeroCrick is waiting for you! Download the app now and show everyone who's boss! Download App Imagine yourself as the captain of your own team of cricket stars, made up of the best players from around the world. Your job is to lead them to victory in exciting fantasy cricket competitions. This is your chance to become a legendary manager and prove that you have the unique instincts and strategic thinking worthy of the greatest coaches! Why choose us? Our app offers incredibly realistic gameplay based on the actual results of cricket matches. You will relive every play, every run and every wicket taken as if you were there yourself! Join thousands of fans around the world who have already become their dream managers in HeroCrick. Download the app now and take control of your team! pages.privacy_policy_site: Privacy Policy HeroCrick. At HeroCrick, we are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our users. Play and Win! Home / Terms / Disclaimer / Privacy Policy Privacy Policy for HeroCrick At HeroCrick, we are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our users. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard the personal information you provide to us when using our website and services. Information Collection and Use HeroCrick collects certain personal information from you when you visit our website or use our services. This may include your name, email address, contact information, and any other details you choose to provide to us. We use this information to provide you with the best possible experience on our platform, to personalize your interactions, and to improve and develop our services. Your personal data is essential for us to be able to respond to your inquiries, process your requests, and communicate with you effectively. Data Security HeroCrick takes the security of your personal information very seriously. We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse. This includes the use of encryption, firewalls, and other technical safeguards to ensure the confidentiality and integrity of your information. We also limit access to your personal data to only those employees, agents, or third-party service providers who need it to perform their assigned duties. All of our personnel are trained on the importance of maintaining the privacy and security of your information. Data Retention and Deletion HeroCrick will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, or as required by applicable laws and regulations. We will securely delete or anonymize your data when it is no longer needed, or upon your request, subject to any legal or regulatory requirements. Third-Party Sharing and Disclosures HeroCrick may share your personal information with third-party service providers that assist us in operating our website and delivering our services. These providers are contractually obligated to protect the privacy and security of your data and are prohibited from using it for any other purpose. We may also disclose your information to comply with legal requirements, protect our rights and property, or in the event of a corporate transaction, such as a merger or acquisition. Your Rights and Choices As a user of HeroCrick, you have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also opt-out of certain data processing activities or withdraw your consent at any time. To exercise your rights or if you have any questions or concerns about our privacy practices, please contact our Data Updates to this Privacy Policy HeroCrick reserves the right to update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website or by other means. By continuing to use our services, you acknowledge and agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. Term & Conditions ❘ Privacy Policy ❘ Disclaimer This Website is only for 18+ users. pages.terms: Terms & Conditions. Welcome to HeroCrick, a premier fantasy sports platform where you can create and manage your own cricket teams, compete against other enthusiasts, and experience the thrill of the game like never before. Home / Terms / Disclaimer / Privacy Policy / Terms & Conditions HeroCrick Welcome to HeroCrick, a premier fantasy sports platform where you can create and manage your own cricket teams, compete against other enthusiasts, and experience the thrill of the game like never before. By accessing and using our website and services, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions. 1. Eligibility The HeroCrick fantasy game is open to individuals aged 18 years and above, unless otherwise specified by local laws and regulations. By using our services, you confirm that you meet the age requirement and possess the necessary legal capacity to enter into a binding agreement. 2. Registration and Account To participate in the HeroCrick fantasy game, you must create a personal account. During the registration process, you will be required to provide accurate and complete information, including your name, email address, and other relevant details. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. 3. Fantasy Team Formation and Management As a HeroCrick user, you have the opportunity to create and manage your own fantasy cricket teams. You are solely responsible for selecting players, adjusting team lineups, and making strategic decisions. HeroCrick provides the platform and tools, but the ultimate responsibility for the performance and outcomes of your team rests with you. 4. Scoring and Prizes HeroCrick utilizes a points-based scoring system to determine the performance of your fantasy teams. The scoring criteria and point allocations are subject to change and will be communicated to you in advance. Any prizes or rewards associated with the fantasy game are subject to the specific terms and conditions provided at the time of the promotion or competition. 5. Prohibited Activities You agree not to engage in any activities that may be deemed illegal, unethical, or disruptive to the HeroCrick platform and community. This includes, but is not limited to, the use of unauthorized third-party tools, scripts, or bots; the manipulation of scoring or game mechanics; and the dissemination of false or misleading information. 6. Intellectual Property HeroCrick and all of its content, including but not limited to the website, software, and game elements, are the property of HeroCrick or its licensors. You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, and non-transferable license to use the HeroCrick platform for your personal, non-commercial use. Any unauthorized use or reproduction of HeroCrick's intellectual property is strictly prohibited. 7. Limitation of Liability HeroCrick shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or related to your use of our services. Our maximum liability shall be limited to the amount of any entry fees or charges you have paid to HeroCrick. 8. Termination and Suspension HeroCrick reserves the right to terminate or suspend your account or access to our services at any time, without prior notice, for any reason, including but not limited to a violation of these terms and conditions. 9. Governing Law and Jurisdiction These terms and conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any disputes arising from or related to the use of HeroCrick's services shall be resolved through binding arbitration or in the courts of India. By using the HeroCrick fantasy game, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these terms and conditions.
